1101111001100001 1011011011111000 0 -> sum: 1001010101011001, cout: 1
1101010100011011 1010000001110100 0 -> sum: 0111010110001111, cout: 1
0100011101010100 1001110010011110 1 -> sum: 1110001111110011, cout: 0
0001011010001100 1101000001010011 1 -> sum: 1110011011100000, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
